## Functions

### createTargetMachineForTriple() {#a8f10e936389f0129adc2f5ded44fdd9a}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Expected&lt; std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; TargetMachine &gt; &gt; llvm::codegen::createTargetMachineForTriple (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> TargetTriple, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8ec1bf8d7b792ca9fac56f8514db18d2">CodeGenOptLevel</a> OptLevel=<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8ec1bf8d7b792ca9fac56f8514db18d2a7a1920d61156abc05a60135aefe8bc67">CodeGenOptLevel::Default</a>)</>}>
Creates a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine">TargetMachine</a> instance with the options defined on the command line.

This can be used for tools that do not need further customization of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetoptions">TargetOptions</a>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/commandflags-h/#l00197">197</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/commandflags-h">CommandFlags.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/commandflags-cpp/#l00750">750</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/commandflags-cpp">CommandFlags.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### InitTargetOptionsFromCodeGenFlags() {#ac754b19265fec508188376da454f57f9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>TargetOptions llvm::codegen::InitTargetOptionsFromCodeGenFlags (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/triple">llvm::Triple</a> &amp; TheTriple)</>}>
Common utility function tightly tied to the options listed here.

Initializes a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetoptions">TargetOptions</a> object with CodeGen flags and returns it. <code>TheTriple</code> is used to determine the default value for options if options are not explicitly specified. If those triple dependant options value do not have effect for your component, a default Triple() could be passed in.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/commandflags-h/#l00172">172</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/commandflags-h">CommandFlags.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/commandflags-cpp/#l00546">546</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/commandflags-cpp">CommandFlags.cpp</a>.
